title: S9E07 – "Paradigm Shifts" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
Otis brings two T-Jay Lea tales to terrifying life. In the first, a sting operation for human trafficking reveals a much worse situation, while in the second the terrifying hidden truth of cosmonauts on the moon is revealed.


To watch the podcast on YouTube: http://bit.ly/ChillingEntertainmentYT


Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or by using this link: http://bit.ly/ScaryStoriesPodcast


If you like the show, telling a friend about it would be amazing! You can text, email, Tweet, or send this link to a friend: http://bit.ly/ScaryStoriesPodcast



Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
